videos.description: Auburn's Jared Harper gets a steal off and sprints to the rack for a huge one-handed jam.
videos.headline: Harper finishes off break with a slam

videos.description: Ryan Welage hits a clutch 3-pointer that cuts Auburn's lead to 33-28 to close out the first half.
videos.headline: Xavier knocks down 3 right before halftime

videos.description: Paul Scruggs knocks in a quick 3-pointer to cut Auburn's lead over Xavier to 77-75 late in the second half.
videos.headline: Xavier cuts the lead to 2 with clutch 3 late

videos.description: Jared Harper goes hard at the rim throwing it down all over Xavier defenders in overtime.
videos.headline: 5'11 Harper goes up for a jaw-dropping jam in traffic

videos.description: Jared Harper talks about how Auburn was able to weather Xavier's storm and his thoughts on his posterizing slam.
videos.headline: Harper ranking his dunk: 'Might be number one'
